name: coughdrop_desktop
description: CoughDrop AAC app, as a desktop app

scripts.installer: copy template.nuspectemplate node_modules\electron-winstaller\template.nuspectemplate /Y && grunt create-windows-installer && node installer_cleanup.js
scripts.rebuild-eyex: cd ..\eyex && copy Tobii.EyeX.Client.64.lib Tobii.EyeX.Client.lib /Y && node-gyp clean && timeout 5 && node-gyp configure --target=v1.3.4 --arch=x64 && timeout 5 && node ..\coughdrop_desktop\fix_node.js && timeout 5 && node-gyp build && copy build\Release\eyex.node eyex.64.node
scripts.rebuild-eyex32: cd ..\eyex && copy Tobii.EyeX.Client.32.lib Tobii.EyeX.Client.lib /Y && node-gyp clean && timeout 5 && node-gyp configure --target=v1.3.4 --arch=ia32 && timeout 5 && node ..\coughdrop_desktop\fix_node.js && timeout 5 && node-gyp build && copy build\Release\eyex.node eyex.32.node
scripts.rebuild-acapela: cd ..\acapela && node-gyp clean && timeout 5 && node-gyp configure --target=v1.3.4 --arch=x64 && timeout 5 && node ..\coughdrop_desktop\fix_node.js && timeout 5 && node-gyp build && copy build\Release\acapela.node acapela.64.node
scripts.rebuild-acapela32: cd ..\acapela && node-gyp clean && timeout 5 && node-gyp configure --target=v1.3.4 --arch=ia32 && timeout 5 && node ..\coughdrop_desktop\fix_node.js && timeout 5 && node-gyp build && copy build\Release\acapela.node acapela.32.node

author: CoughDrop, Inc.
